```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r}
jitter = 7
set.seed(1234)

tibble(y = rep(0:10, (0:10) * 6 + 1)) %>% 
  group_by(y) %>% 
  mutate(
    n = row_number() - 1,
    x = n / (y * 6) * pi,
    x = ifelse(is.na(x), 0, x)
    ) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(row_number = row_number()) %>% 
  group_by(row_number) %>% 
  mutate(
    y_random = ifelse(
      x < pi/2 & x > 0,
      y + rnorm(1) / jitter,
      y
    ),
    x_random = ifelse(
      x < pi/2 & x > 0,
      x + rnorm(1) / jitter^2,
      x
    ),
    y = as.factor(y)
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x_random, y_random, color = y, group = y)) +
  geom_point(size = 5) +
  coord_polar() +
  theme_map() +
  theme(legend.position = "drop")
```
